system.Text:
When you __traverse an area within a perilous site__, envision your surroundings (@Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.aba3e44b7e810c0f]{Ask the Oracle} if unsure). Then, consider your approach. If you navigate this area...

  * With haste: Roll +edge.
  * With stealth or trickery: Roll +shadow.
  * With observation, intuition, or expertise: Roll +wits.

On a __strong hit__, you delve deeper. Mark progress and @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironsworndelvemoves.4da87fd54eaa1b89]{Find an Opportunity}. On a __weak hit__, roll on the following table according to your stat.

On a __miss__, @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironsworndelvemoves.06f78b87b9532437]{Reveal a Danger}.

{{table_columns>move:delve/delve/delve_the_depths}}

Trigger.Text: When you traverse an area within a perilous site...

Strong Hit.Text: On a __strong hit__, you delve deeper. Mark progress and @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironsworndelvemoves.4da87fd54eaa1b89]{Find an Opportunity}.

Weak Hit.Text:
On a __weak hit__, roll on the following table according to your stat.

{{table_columns>move:delve/delve/delve_the_depths}}
